Closely intertwined with #FiveDemandsNotOneLess are a set of HK core values, equality of social institutions, justice of the distribution of resources, complete implementation of the rule of law, transparent administration of the government, and adequate participation by the people

1. Withdraw the extradition bill
2. Retract the proclamation of riot
3. Withdrew criminal charge against all protesters
4. Independent investigation of abuse of power by police and dismiss whole police force
5. Implement two universal suffrage

在「五大訴求」的深處，其實是一個價值坐標：社會制度的公平、資源分配的正義、法治精神的貫徹、政府治理的透明、人民參政的充分。

五大訴求，缺一不可
1. 真正撤回逃反條例修訂
2. 撤回光復香港運動暴動定性
3. 無條件撤銷所有被捕者罪名
4. 解散警隊，成立獨立調查委員會
5. 立即實行真。雙普選
